We have been busy improving app performance and squashing bugs to make sure you have the best version of the Super Chinese APP.

We’ve just rolled out some pretty cool new features.

1. You can now fully unlock your Chinese learning potential, freely review your previous lessons to practice Chinese vocabulary, character writing, listening, speaking and grammar. Easily skip levels by passing the test.
2. For total beginners, we now have comprehensive Pinyin learning functionality. Speak Chinese fluently from the onset.
3. We’ve also added a textbook function so you can see how far you’ve come in your Chinese learning journey.
4. The speech recognition function is even better.
5. All functions are now more optimized to ensure you have the best version of Super Chinese.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, we’d love to hear from you.

Contact us via email: hello@superchinese.com

This update includes a few useful new features:
1. We’ve added a daily check-in reward. Log in every day to earn MonkeyCoins.
2. Trade your MonkeyCoins for Study Time! You no longer have to worry about not having enough free minutes to study Chinese with us.
3. We’ve added a Knowledge Bank where you can easily find all the content you’ve studied so far. Use it as revision or a Chinese dictionary!
4. Optimised vocab cards and added more practice exercises.
5. We’ve listened to our users and optimized some functions based on your useful feedback.

Super Chinese is working hard to make learning Chinese easy and fun!

1. We've added an AI-based level test so you can find out your exact Chinese level in only 10 minutes. Come try it out.
2. You can now see your classmates' study reports. Follow your friends and learn Chinese faster together!

The Super Chinese 3.0 upgrade is here!
Our amazing content team has optimized your whole study process. It's now more fun, more complete and more effective!
1. We've improved the lesson structure, so every unit now has even more varied content for you to learn Chinese with!
2. Each lesson now has a cover page, so it's easier to see which content you're studying next.
3. We've completely revamped level 1, come check it out! Other levels in progress, so keep an eye out for those.
4. We've fixed a couple of tiny bugs and optimised your user experience.

p.s. We're letting you in on a secret: more epic study functions coming soon! We can't wait to share those with you.
